description: Detects creation of new ".dll" files inside the plugins directory of a notepad++ installation by a process other than "gup.exe". Which could indicates possible persistence
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
false_positives: Possible FPs during first installation of Notepad++
Legitimate use of custom plugins to enhance notepad++ functionality by users
name: Potential Persistence Via Notepad++ Plugins
query: ((file.path.text:*\\Notepad\+\+\\plugins\\* AND file.path.text:*.dll) AND (NOT (((process.executable.text:*\\Notepad\+\+\\updater\\gup.exe)) OR ((process.executable.text:C\:\\Users\\* AND process.executable.text:*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\* AND process.executable.text:(*\\target.exe OR *Installer.x64.exe))))))
